name: Caral Full Day Tour
description: Caral was inhabited between roughly 2600 BCE and 2000 BCE enclosing an area of more than 60 hectares Caral was described by its excavators as the oldest urban center in the Americas, a claim that was later challenged as other ancient sites were found nearby, such as Bandurria, Peru Accommodating more than 3,000 inhabitants, it is the best studied and one of the largest  Norte Chico sites known.
